name: Green Spirit Hydroponics
tag_list: hydroponics, hydroponic, hydroponic-grow-systems, hydroponic-growing, sheffield, uk
overview:
Green Spirit Hydroponics of Sheffield offer a selection of indoor plant lighting, hydroponic grow systems, hydro and organic horticultural supplies, grow light and other grow-room equipment & indoor gardening accessories.

Green Spirit Hydroponics is a full service source for organic and hydroponic gardeners. They offer an extensive and unique product range of hydroponics kit including the most advanced Aeroponic, Nutrients and Hydroponic systems in the world.

Green Spirit Hydroponics have a showroom in Sheffield, where you can discuss your hydro growing needs in person, or you can call or email them and their staff will assist you.

Green Spirit Hydroponics provides grow rooms (grow tents) and accessories along with hydroponic systems and supplies for all indoor growing needs. They supply lighting systems, hydroponic nutrients, fertilizers and pest control e.t.c.

Tel: 01142 753353 Email: info@greenspirit-hydroponics.com Website: http://www.greenspirit-hydroponics.com/
